Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nonchalance \Non`cha`lance"\, n. [F. See {Nonchalant}.] Indifference; carelessness; coolness. [1913 Webster]
nonchalance n : the trait of remaining calm and seeming not to care; a casual lack of concern [syn: {unconcern}, {indifference}]
